root: ^You've been summoned back to Dispatch for another performance review. While you know Avanshore is falling to ruin, no one has been able to connect the isolated incidents of the Midas Beasts, let alone find their cause.
^Kellis is reeling you back to HQ, likely to address this, and you hopefully give guidance on how to proceed.

^Lanri says that there's no telling how much of the golden wreckage is left slingshoting through planetary orbits, and predicting entry points will be next to impossible. Your time to finish Kellis' final test is closing, but the first matter is returning to Dispatch.
